# MXAnimationMetric

**Class**

An object representing metrics about the responsiveness of animation in the app.

## Declaration

```swift
class MXAnimationMetric
```

## Reading the ratio of scrolling hitch time

- **scrollHitchTimeRatio**: The ratio of the time spent hitching while scrolling.

## Reading the ratio of hitch time

- **hitchTimeRatio**: The ratio of time spent hitching during tracked animations.

## Responsiveness metrics

- **MXAppLaunchMetric**: An object representing metrics about app launch time.
- **MXAppResponsivenessMetric**: An object representing metrics about the responsiveness of the app to user interaction.
- **MXHangDiagnostic**: An object representing a diagnostic report for an app that is too busy to handle user input responsively.

- MXMetric
